battlecode.common
Enum ActionType

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ActionType>
      battlecode.common.ActionType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ActionType>
public enum ActionType
extends java.lang.Enum<ActionType>

An ActionType represents a robot action that may occupy a robot for multiple rounds. A robot always has a current action represented by exactly one ActionType. ActionTypes may have an attack cooldown, a movement cooldown, both or neither.

Author:
Teh Devs

Enum Constant Summary
ATTACKING
          Indicates a robot that is attacking.
EVOLVING
          Indicates a robot that is evolving into a different RobotType.
IDLE
          Indicates an inactive robot, that can initiate a new action.
MOVING
          Indicates a robot that is moving to a different MapLocation.
SETTING_DIRECTION
          Indicates a robot that is changing the direction it's facing.
SPAWNING
          Indicates a 'parent' robot that is spawning a new robot.
WAKING
          Indicates a 'child' robot that is being spawned.

Enum Constant Detail

IDLE

public static final ActionType IDLE
Indicates an inactive robot, that can initiate a new action.

MOVING

public static final ActionType MOVING
Indicates a robot that is moving to a different MapLocation. The duration of this action is given by RobotType.moveDelayOrthogonal() or RobotType.moveDelayDiagonal().

ATTACKING

public static final ActionType ATTACKING
Indicates a robot that is attacking. The duration of this action is given by RobotType.attackDelay().

SPAWNING

public static final ActionType SPAWNING
Indicates a 'parent' robot that is spawning a new robot. The duration of this action is given by rt.spawnDelay(), where rt is the RobotType of the child robot.

EVOLVING

public static final ActionType EVOLVING
Indicates a robot that is evolving into a different RobotType. The duration of this action is given by rt.spawnDelay(), where rt is the RobotType of the new (evolved) robot.

WAKING

public static final ActionType WAKING
Indicates a 'child' robot that is being spawned. The duration of this action is given by rt.wakeDelay(), where rt is the RobotType of the child robot.

SETTING_DIRECTION

public static final ActionType SETTING_DIRECTION
Indicates a robot that is changing the direction it's facing. The duration of this action is 1 round.
